'''Jasper Arryn''' is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. He is deceased when the events of the series begin and is not expected to appear in the series. He has only appeared in the [[House Arryn]] family tree issued by [[HBO]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Jasper's family was unchanged.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Jasper was the Head of [[House Arryn]] and the [[Lord of the Eyrie]]. He had three children [[Jon Arryn|Jon]], [[Alys Arryn|Alys]], and [[Ronnel Arryn|Ronnel]].<ref>http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/#!/guide/houses/arryn/</ref>
